column21: and cannot be redeemed for cash or credit."
column22:
long-description:"*This title is developed with the full game of the MVS (arcade version NEOGEO) version as a base. The content might be different from the NEOGEO home version or other contents released for family consoles.

\"RIDING HERO\" is a realistic racing game released by SNK in 1990.
2 types of modes including the \"W.G.P (World Grand Prix) Mode\" for the player to compete with top riders from around the world
column23:
and the \" 8 hours endurance race\" with RPG features for the young street racer to take on the challenge in a 8 hours endurance race will be available in the game.
So feel the thrilling sensation from this original bike racing game!

The ACA NEOGEO series is developed with the concept of recreating popular works of NEOGEO.
Various game settings including the difficulty level can be set
column24:
recreating the feeling from the cathode-ray tube type of televisions.
Players can also compete with other players around the world using the online ranking feature with scores.
Please enjoy the masterpiece that built a generation for video games.
